thread.title: Lake Winnipesaukee accident leaves 2 dead | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Lake Winnipesaukee accident leaves 2 dead | Daily Mail Online

author: Keith Griffith For Dailymail.Com
title: Lake Winnipesaukee accident leaves 2 dead | Daily Mail Online
text: Rescuers from the Alton Fire Department respond to scene of the missing boy Ice fishermen are shown participating in the Meredith Rotary Club Ice Fishing Derby Saturday A custom snowmobile is seen at Lake Winnipesaukee on Saturday The first incident took place around noon, when three snowmobiles went through the ice about 300 yards off shore. One man escaped the freezing water quickly and is expected to recover. Searchers pulled another rider from the water and tried to revive him, but he was pronounced dead after transport to an area hospital. A third man was found dead in the water hours later, with the aid of sonar search equipment. Around 4pm, a father and son on snowmobiles broke through the thin ice elsewhere, near Rattlesnake Island. The father was rescued, but the son, 15, was still missing when searchers were forced to return to shore at sunset. The search is set to resume Sunday morning, but authorities fear the worst. Lake Winnipesaukee seen on Friday. Searchers were forced to halt the search for the missing 15-year-old as the sun set at the lake on Saturday Read more:
